summary: Highly efficient Senior/Lead Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance systems for global teams. Specialized in full-stack development using Laravel, React, Node.js and Java (Spring Boot). Expert in API architecture, cloud-native deployments (AWS), CI/CD automation, and production-grade problem solving. Proven track record of leading distributed teams, mentoring developers, and delivering reliable software in remote, async-first environments. Known for ownership, clear communication, and consistently shipping high-quality solutions.

projects.name: e-Commerce Site and Admin Panel
projects.description: A secure and scalable e-commerce platform offering user accounts, product catalog, advanced search, cart and checkout, multiple payment methods, order tracking, reviews, discounts, and wishlist features. Admins get full control with product management, inventory, orders, customers, coupons, reports, and analytics

projects.name: Hotel Management System
projects.description: A complete hotel management platform offering room booking, check-in/out, customer profiles, payment processing, housekeeping tracking, and reservation calendars. Admins can manage rooms, pricing, staff, guests, invoices, and occupancy reports. The system improves efficiency with automated notifications, real-time availability, secure payments, and a clean dashboard for smooth hotel operations.

projects.name: School Management System
projects.description: A modern school management system featuring student admission, attendance, classes, exams, grades, fees, and notifications. Teachers can manage lessons, assignments, and results while parents track progress and payments. Admins control students, staff, subjects, timetables, fees, reporting, and communication. Designed for smooth academic management and efficient school operations.

projects.name: Newspaper Management System
projects.description: A digital newspaper management system that handles news creation, editing, publishing, categories, and breaking-news updates. Journalists can submit articles, editors approve them, and admins manage users, ads, comments, and analytics. With SEO-friendly pages, scheduling, multimedia support, and smooth workflow, it ensures fast, organized, and engaging online news delivery.

projects.name: AI Chat Integration System
projects.description: An intelligent AI chat integration that provides automated responses, customer support, real-time assistance, and personalized recommendations. It connects seamlessly with websites, apps, and CRMs. Admins can view chat history, manage responses, train custom models, and track insights. The system enhances user experience with instant, accurate, and interactive AI-powered communication.
projects.technologies: Laravel 10, PorqOpenAI Integration, Hugging Face AI Integration and Groq AI Integration
